# King County Sheriff's Office

## Why did we choose this data set?
Initially, as a group, we set our sights on pursuing a project that would work with meaningful data that could help people. We browsed around from _Google Trends_, _Seattle Police Department_, and other sets of data. However, the King County Sheriff's Office stood out from the rest. This data set had interesting categories that we could create vivd visualizations from.
